Great! Let me give you this instructional
leaflet to help you get started.
1) Cast your lines out in areas where you see
bubbles. This indicates the most likely spot
for activity. Once you have found something,
the next spot should be visible.
2) Be aware of indigenous creatures living in
3) You will be paid gold for fish that you
catch, varying on size, and keep any items
4) The Fishing Post accepts no liability for
No problem, see you next time!
